attributes.action: Stop insurance companys using Acts of God as a way to get out of paying out o claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After recent gail force winds insurance companys claim its an act of god ,please stop this total farce till proof has been sought that God really does exist and causes these weather extremes causing car and home damage .just another excuse by insurance companys not to pay up
